articles.title: Trump nominates Dr Casey Means, influencer close to RFK Jr, for surgeon general
articles.description: President taps wellness influencer after withdrawing initial pick, former Fox News contributor Janette Nesheiwat
articles.content:
Donald Trump has tapped Dr Casey Means, a wellness influencer with close ties to Robert F Kennedy Jr, the US health secretary, as nominee for surgeon general after withdrawing his initial pick for the influential health post.

articles.title: Trump withdraws surgeon general nominee, replaces her with Stanford grad, doctor
articles.description: President Donald Trump on Wednesday withdrew Dr. Janette Nesheiwat as his nominee for U.S. surgeon general and announced Dr. Casey Means as his new selection.
articles.content:
May 7 (UPI) -- President Donald Trump on Wednesday withdrew Dr. Janette Nesheiwat as his nominee for U.S. surgeon general and announced Dr. Casey Means as his new selection.

articles.title: Dr. Casey Means, Trump's new surgeon general nominee, is RFK Jr. ally and MAHA advocate
articles.description: President Trump said his new pick for surgeon general, Dr. Casey Means, has "impeccable" credentials, after the White House withdrew his earlier nominee.
articles.content:
President Trump will nominate Dr. Casey Means, an ally of Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and prominent advocate for his agenda, to serve as the U.S. surgeon general, the president announced Wednesday.
